price: Enti Nyankopͻn adom yεn, εna Wayi yεn afri (Amanehunu gya) mframa hyehyeε no mu.
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: famanna al-lahu ʿalaynā wawaqānā ʿadhāba al-samūmi
